content: {"Name": "Town of Berne Community & Senior Center", "Entity_Id": 2638, "Category": "Community Meal/Soup Kitchen", "Subcategory": "Senior Meal Services", "Organization": "Life Path Supportive Services for Older Adults", "More_Information": "Once registered at one of LifePath\u2019s Community Dining sites, you are welcome to visit and participate in a meal at any of our sites!\r\n\r\nPlease call the number listed below by 1 pm the day before to register for your meal. While the dining room opens one hour prior to the meal, many of our Centers are open earlier for programming and socialization opportunities.", "Counties": ["Albany"], "Location": "Life Path Managed", "Address": "1360 Helderberg Trail", "City": "Berne", "State": "NY", "Zip": "12023", "Phone": "518 465 6465", "Hours_of_Operation": "Lunch Served on Tuesdays and Fridays 11:30 am", "Cost": "", "Accepts": "", "Website": "https://lifepathny.org/programs/communitydining/", "Coalition": 0, "CFAN": 0, "Latitude": "42.622030", "Longitude": "-74.111660", "Last_Updated": "05-20-2025", "icon": "marker-4FA03B", "collection_name": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "collection_category": "Food Pantry"}
